page.title: 05EDUCATION BEULAH - GARTH
page.content: Under Powys Local Educatin Authority. Primary,one central school in Garth, Irfon Valley School.Pupils from 4-11. Present roll approx.100 children.Staff 5 teachers, 2 nursery nurses,2 cooks. Meals cooked on premises.Children tran -sported from from Beulah and outlying areas by bus and taxis. Secondary, all children 11-16,some to 18.Transported to Builth High School by buses,which collect them along route.Exams taken -Cert.of Sec.Ed.and Ordinary level at about 15 years,Adv. Level at about 17 years. Further Education courses to a more advanced level,often on a part-time basis (day release from work).Colleges at Llandrindod, Brecon, and Newtown. Courses cover wide subjects such as building work, agriculture,nursing, nursery nursing and business studies.
